meta.title: Dagin Pet Relocation Agency
meta.description: Reliable Pet Relocation Services in Dubai - Ensure a Smooth Move for Your Furry Friend. Expert pet travel assistance. Contact us for a stress-free pet move to or from UAE today!

header.header_description: Do you need to transport your pet to or from the UAE? Dagin Pets Relocation is happy to offer you all kinds of assistance, from pet full-cycle pet relocation to pet taxi services within the UAE.

about.text: The Dagin team aims to ensure the safety and comfort of your pets during the flight. We are licensed by the Ministry of Climate Change and Environment (–ú–û–°–°–ê–ï) and certified in the area of international requirements for the transport of animals (IATA LAR*) to arrange all the necessary procedures and paperwork.

services.title_ending: offers a wide range of services, including:
services.service1_description: We will advise you on the necessary procedures needed for your pet to travel (microchipping, vaccinations, testing) and, if necessary, arrange for a doctor appointment for you.
services.service2_description: We will book the most suitable flight for your pet, taking into account its size, weight, breed and other criteria.
services.service3_description: We will provide all the necessary support and assistance in obtaining export and import documents, such as permission to import / export your pet, veterinary health certificates in accordance with the requirements of the destination / departure country.
services.service4_description: We can provide door-to-door relocation services, e.g. by arranging our partners to send the pet from the departure country, and completing all the necessary procedures upon arrival in the UAE and delivery to the new home ourselves.
services.service5_header:
Help with adaptation and
reducing your pet's stress level:
services.service5_description: Assistance in selecting mild and natural ways to reduce stress levels of a pet during relocation process, and if required - arranging a relevant specialist for a consultation.

safety.value_title:
We prioritize the health
and well-being of your pets
safety.value_desciption: Our mission is to ensure the most comfortable and safe transportation for them. Don't hesitate to reach out to us today to learn more about our services, receive a free consultation on pet transportation in the UAE, or book a pet taxi for your furry friend.

reviews.reviews_description: Our story: delighted reviews on pet transportation

reviews_data.message: Many thanks from our entire family and personally from Caspar David, Anastasia @AnastasiaBelykh. In all (not the easiest) situations, Anastasia was there, giving advice and helping in the most critical moments! In the spring, Anastasia and I arranged the departure from Dubai back to Russia, and considering that we had to do it with my 5-year-old son, as he couldn't bear to be separated from Caspi for even a short while üôà, it was a heroic day! Anastasia even treated the child to delicious homemade cheesecakes ‚ù§Ô∏è‚ù§Ô∏è‚ù§Ô∏è. But the biggest challenge was upon our return to the UAE a few days ago, from which we are still recovering. Endless stress, over 20 calls and emails a day to Etihad Airways for three days (because there was no response regarding the documents)... A day before the flight, when we were traveling on the train from St. Petersburg to Moscow (almost without connection), we found out that titers were required (which were not needed because the vaccination was administered in the UAE), and it was only with Anastasia's help that we managed to figure out that there was an error in the documents, and our chances were extremely slim!
reviews_data.name: Elena

reviews_data.message: Today, thanks to Anastasia @AnastasiaBelykh, our beloved cat safely made it to Sharjah. Anastasia organized everything 'turnkey' and brought our kitty all the way from Khabarovsk.The journey was quite a distance: a flight from Khabarovsk to Moscow (in the cabin) and then Moscow to Dubai (cargo). Anastasia organized everything in the shortest possible time, sent a wonderful pet courier to pick up the cat, arranged an overnight stay in Moscow for her to rest, and then personally went through all the checks in Dubai and brought her straight to our home.The cat handled all these flights calmly, and she is now doing great and getting used to her new home.A huge thank you to Anastasia! Everything was fast, precise, and of high quality. Special thanks for the support, answering my numerous questions, and providing photo updates. In the end, everything went perfectly, and it was not scary at all. Once again, heartfelt thanks and a big recommendation!
reviews_data.name: Alexandra

reviews_data.message: I want to thank Anastasia for the fast and high-quality delivery of our Bombay kitten to Dubai! Anastasia, thank you so much! It was very nice to meet you! Everything was so prompt! ‚ù§Ô∏è‚ù§Ô∏è‚ù§Ô∏è‚ù§Ô∏è‚ù§Ô∏è The buyer is very satisfied! ü•∞
reviews_data.name: Margarita

reviews_data.message: Hello everyone! At 4 in the morning, we welcomed our beloved pet, brought by @AnastasiaBelykh.I express huge thanks from our entire family for reuniting him with us.The cat flew as cargo, is doing well, and is healthy.He's catching up on his naps after the flight.I highly recommend everyone to turn to Anastasia for pet transportation:‚úÖ Pick up and delivery at home‚úÖ Assistance with documents‚úÖ Photo updates‚úÖ She kept me informed at every stage: customs, loading, arrival, etc. ‚úÖ
reviews_data.name: Evgenya

reviews_data.message: Good day, everyone! I want to officially declare that this photo was made possible thanks to Anastasia @AnastasiaBelykh))We are among the very anxious owners who fear making mistakes at every turn and having their dog not allowed on the plane. But thanks to Anastasia's patience, attentiveness, and ability to clearly communicate information and plan the timely receipt of all documents, everything went very smoothly üòä. She explained everything, reassured us, and gave us a nudge when needed üòÇ. As a result, transporting our little one went wonderfully, without nerves or breakdowns (except for the flight delay, which unfortunately is not within her control))) Thousand thanks from us and a bunch of recommendations to all our acquaintances üòçü´∂.
reviews_data.name: Anita

reviews_data.message: Today, Dubai welcomed one more Siberian Husky üòÉ. A huge thanks to Anastasia @AnastasiaBelykh for organizing the transportation and for being in constant communication with us ü•∞. Thanks to her, our beloved Ichi made it from Moscow to Dubai in cargo and is doing great. Anastasia is a super professional who organized everything extremely efficiently, taking care of all the transportation details. I still can't believe it's all behind us, and our red one has arrived). And yes, as many in the chat have mentioned, we worried more than it was worth it. Our dog is already settling into the new home and showing no signs of stress :)
reviews_data.name: Olga

reviews_data.message: Hello, everyone! I want to thank @AnastasiaBelykh for helping transport our Yorick from Moscow to Abu Dhabi! Everything was super precise, always available, and she definitely knows her stuff! Plus, Anastasia is very pleasant and positive! Thanks to her once again!
reviews_data.name: Tanya

reviews_data.message: A short review and a big thank you to @AnastasiaBelykh. Anastasia helped us with the paperwork for two cats in the airplane cabin and booked a flight to Barcelona. She assisted in securing the flight and answered all our silly questions! The kitties are happy!
reviews_data.name: Dmitriy

faq.faq_description: Everything you wanted to know but couldn't find
faq.more_question_description: We would be happy to assist you.

faq_data.question: How will my pet be transported?
faq_data.answer:
There are two most common ways to transport a pet:
1) In cabin (so that your pet is all the time accompanied by you or our employee). This is the way to go for small pets, and in general the weight limit is up to 8 kg with carrier. As an exception, service dogs are sometimes allowed to travel in cabin regardless of their size, when they accompany a passenger with disability.
2) In hold (most often when the pet is too large to fit in cabin or needs to travel unaccompanied). Typically, pets are transported on the same aircrafts, as humans, in a specialized and safe cargo compartment. Here are the two options of transporting pets in hold:
- Manifest cargo. For flights to the UAE it is typically required that  pets are transported as manifest cargo (which requires additional paperwork and clearance procedures). You may travel on the same flight, but you don't have to.
- Checked-in baggage. When you travel from the UAE, you may take your pet as baggage, which allows significant time saving on clearance procedures. It is also way cheaper, as the rates are way lower. Don't worry, that is not the same as carrying a suitcase, and your pet will not be surrounded by bags during it's journey. In any airport there are specific rules on live animals handling which ensure safety.

faq_data.question: How is it better to transport a pet?
faq_data.answer: Briefly - there is no right or wrong answer here. For some pets presence of mom and dad around is absolutely critical, and for some its actually easier to fly alone. In general, if you are under high stress, it might be beneficial to send pet as cargo - they do feel our anxiety during relocations. From some destination a direct flight in cargo is available, and compared to multiple stopovers of in-cabin transportation this may be easier. We are happy to support you in decision-making depending on your individual case.

faq_data.question: Is it safe to transport pets in cargo hold?
faq_data.answer: In terms of safety, transportation in hold is performed by airlines in accordance with IATA regulations, and is safe for animals. The specific temperature regime in hold may depend upon the specific aircraft that you will be using, however, it is always an acceptable temperature for your beloved ones. As for the airline, everything is also individual and depends on your destination.

faq_data.question: How do I prepare my pet for relocation?
faq_data.answer: Basically, for nearly all destinations you will need to microchip your pet and do the annual vaccines. In terms of other requirements - they will depend on the destination of your journey, and may include various tests and health check ups. It is very useful to get an advice from a relocation agent before getting any extra tests done. This will allow to prevent excessive costs (and tests which you don't need), and at the same time be fully ready for the journey. Typically, after the microchip and vaccines, right before your journey (a few days in advance) you will need to obtain additional health certificates, but this part usually does not require long term planning.  We will assist you throughout the process so that everything is clear and under control.

faq_data.question: Which medications should I give to my pet before the flight?
faq_data.answer: In general, it is advised not to give any extra medications. However, it always makes sense to get an advice from your veterinarian, if there are any heart or stress-related conditions that may require additional attention.

faq_data.question: How far in advance should I plan the relocation of my pet?
faq_data.answer: It's advisable to start planning as early as possible, especially for certain destinations. The preparation period may be above 6 months, but we will be happy to accommodate last-minute requests when necessary and possible.

faq_data.question: What services does your pet relocation company offer?
faq_data.answer: We offer a wide range of services, which allow you to travel together with your pet or order door-to-door relocation service depending on your destination and personal preferences.
